snippet.title: Aliisha－The Oblivion of Twin Goddesses：Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Lisha and Aisha are twin sisters. Due to their abnormalities, the twin sisters have been discriminated against since little. Lisha, born a few seconds before Aisha, fails to perceive anything. Lack of concern toward the surroundings, Lisha always contemplates any problem with reason and logic. Aisha, on the other hand, is sensitive and susceptible. As the younger sister, Aisha loves going on an adventure. No matter how seriously injured during the adventure, Aisha does not feel any pain at all. Absence of emotion and pain, the twin sisters are seen as freaks by people around them. 

During one field trip, Aisha discovered the ancient, abandoned temple that only exists in locals’ folklore. From generation to generation, all priestesses are assumed by twins. The old legend appeals to Aisha, so she reads on more. From the religious literature, Aisha learns that a certain mysterious appliance from the temple can integrate the souls of the twins. Desiring to know more about the secrets of twins, Aisha invites Lisha to explore the sanctuary together. Immersed in science, Lisha does not believe in folklore based on word of mouth only. Persistent, Aisha asks Lisha again and again. In the end, Lisha gives in by sending AMBU, the AI emotion collector designed by herself, to go on an adventure with Aisha in the forsaken temple.

In the game, you play as Aisha who is exploring with AMBU, the cautious and realistic AI representing Lisha. For duo players, you have to work together for multiple choices and endings, based on asymmetric information. This is a great game to see if you can talk to your friends, how much your partner really knows about you, and what chemistry you share with your family. In the game, you can experience a unique adventure full of puzzles that require teamwork.

一對雙胞胎姊妹Lisha與Aisha，從小因各自異於常人的缺陷，飽受週遭異樣眼光，姐姐Lisha無法感受、認知情感，思考理性，妹妹Aisha感情豐沛，時常探險弄得一身傷，卻沒有常人的痛覺，這樣的兩人，時常被週遭人當成異類。

在一次考察中，發現一座當地人代代口傳的古老荒廢神殿，歷任祭司皆由雙胞胎神子擔任，古老傳說引起妹妹Aisha的注意，而後又從神殿文獻得知，殿內某樣神器可將靈魂合而為一，心想或許神殿內有雙胞胎相關的秘密，興奮的拉著姐姐Lisha要前往一探究竟，但對於鑽研科學的姐姐，這樣毫無科學根據的傳說無法使她信服，但面對Aisha百般邀請，無奈只好派出自己研發的AI情感蒐集機器人「AMBU」，陪同Aisha一起進到神殿遺跡探險。

遊戲全程，考驗玩家手眼協調的妹妹Aisha，跟細心理性代表姐姐Lisha的AI機器人，一起找尋線索，再加上雙玩家間「不對稱資訊」分享合作，多樣選擇、多樣結局，順便測試好友能不能聊、考驗伴侶懂不懂你、發現家人有沒有默契，《Aliisha》的相互合作，體驗非常規的合作冒險解謎遊戲。
